TopicTitle: Firespitter propeller plane and helicopter parts v7.1 (May 5th) for KSP 1.0

Articles.Content:
Hadn't noticed 0.24 was out. I'll do a recompile today, but with summer being here, I haven't finished all the features for the new parts yet, so it may end up as FS v6 + dll v7.

So? How did it go?
Looking forward to the update.

In the interest of backwards compatability, here's a release of the final version of the dll for 0.23.5.

Starting the 0.24 reference updates now.
And here's the preliminary 0.24 dll
Awesome, thanks for the update!

And here's the preliminary 0.24 dll

and you sir are fast!

And here's the preliminary 0.24 dll

Goodness gracious! And now all that's left is KAS and Infernal Robotics...
Thank you for your speedy work. That one little dll file is the bottleneck in so many update incompatibilities in many mods.

thanks!

/10 char

Goodness gracious! And now all that's left is KAS and Infernal Robotics...

And TACLS >_>

And TACLS >_>

TACLS has a .9 preview up that should be 0.24 compatible... So just KAS for me.

On an unrelated note, thank you very much for the quick update to this.

Sorry if I'm just a little slow on this one and missed the message, but are either of those DLLs meant to replace the one in the 7.0 pre-release you did the video on? With the 7.0 pre2 installed, I get le crash on loading to the space center after the main menu (0.24, 64-bit), and it seems to do the same thing using the 0.24 DLL you posted on the last page instead of the one bundled in 7.0 pre2.

And here's the preliminary 0.24 dll

Thanks... would be nice if you hook that also to your initial post... I almost missed that
Does this fix animations for B9 for anyone else? Mine still aren't working, but other people are saying that theirs are working?

Unfortunately the preliminary 0.24 Firespitter dll still causes MechJeb2 to crash KSP.

Current version of MechJeb2 and Firespitter aren't compatible it seems.

Unfortunately the preliminary 0.24 Firespitter dll still causes MechJeb2 to crash KSP.

Current version of MechJeb2 and Firespitter aren't compatible it seems.

Under which circumstances does it break? Can you post an output_log from KSP_Data?

I would think the error is with MechJeb just because the code in FS is almost entitely contained inside each part, whereas MechJeb reaches into all manner of things.

Under which circumstances does it break? Can you post an output_log from KSP_Data?

I would think the error is with MechJeb just because the code in FS is almost entitely contained inside each part, whereas MechJeb reaches into all manner of things.

Would love to, away from home PC at the moment. Will PM you a log soon as I'm able.

Unfortunately the preliminary 0.24 Firespitter dll still causes MechJeb2 to crash KSP.

Current version of MechJeb2 and Firespitter aren't compatible it seems.

Same issue here, had to remove Firespitter and crashes stopped.

Same issue here, had to remove Firespitter and crashes stopped.

Hmm... That might actually be what's causing my own crashes...

Strange...

I tried to reproduce the crashes but have now been unable. Was able to launch, have MechJeb2 direct a rendezvous and no crashes.

Did something get updated?

Same issue here, had to remove Firespitter and crashes stopped.

When does it crash?

POST LOG. Snjo, like Sarbian, does not have a magic wand. How's he supposed to magically know what's crashing if you don't tell him? Don't you think that if he knew what was causing the problem, he'd have already fixed it?

i dont know what to do. i install firespitter and then put the new dll. in and it says its outdated and i cant use it. Maybe i installed it wrong?

Edited July 20, 2014 by Old Man Jenkins

i dont know what to do. i install firespitter and then put the new dll. in and it says its outdated and i cant use it. Maybe i installed it wrong?

All you need to do is delete the "old" Firespitter.dll and replace it with the new recompile. If you're overwriting anything, you're doing it wrong.
oh thats the problem. thanks
